name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan has more than 5 million vending machines, offering everything from drinks to umbrellas.

name: India
interestingFact: India is the birthplace of chess, yoga, and the decimal system.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world's oxygen.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has more lakes than any other country—over 2 million!

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is known for having over 1,500 types of sausages.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa has three capital cities, each serving a different branch of government.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world, attracting over 90 million tourists annually.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: The Great Pyramid of Giza was the tallest man-made structure for over 3,800 years.

name: New Zealand
interestingFact: New Zealand was the first country to grant women the right to vote in 1893.
